subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfonso Soriano stepped into the batter’s box for the first time in a Chicago Cubs’ uniform, with the left-hander Barry Zito on the mound ready to throw his first pitch for the San Francisco Giants.
snippet: Alfonso Soriano stepped into the batter’s box for the first time in a Chicago Cubs’ uniform, with the left-hander Barry Zito on the mound ready to throw his first pitch for the San Francisco Giants.
